titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3688) to implement the United States-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3688) to implement the United States-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-432, by Ms. Matsui.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3688 with 3 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 147.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 801.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 349 - 55 (Roll no. 1059).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3688 (United States-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement Implementation Act).
